data.1: I CALL TO witness the chargers, snorting, rushing to battle before the others,
data.2: Then those striking sparks of fire,
data.3: Then those charging in the morning
data.6: That man is ungrateful to his Lord
data.7: And is himself witness to it,
data.8: And is intractable in his love of worldly goods.
data.9: Does he not know when the contents of the graves are laid bare
data.10: And the secrets of the hearts exposed,
data.11: Surely their Lord will be aware of their (deeds).
